title: DATAFRONTIERS 2026 - International Data Science Congress
description: International Data Science Congress to be held on June 4-5, 2026 at Universidad Técnica Federico Santa María, Joaquín Campus - Santiago. Organized by the Department of Electronics and Computer Science at UTFSM Concepción Campus. This event will bring together leading industry leaders, academics, and public sector representatives to explore the latest trends in data analytics, artificial intelligence, and their impact on our society.
